Southeast Iceland.text:

In southeast, northerly or northeasterly 4 to 6, becoming variable 2 to 4 later. In northwest, variable 2 to 4, becoming easterly or southeasterly 3 to 5, increasing 6 at times later.

Weather
In southeast, showers, becoming wintry later. In northwest, rain or sleet later.

Good, occasionally poor later.
